body_html: Thanks for your input, however we will favor reproducibility in our CI to help us with debugging. setup.py is designed to be more flexible to enable a wider variety of user environments, but our CI has to be reproducible so that we can clearly pinpoint any issues in our build history.
body_text: Thanks for your input, however we will favor reproducibility in our CI to help us with debugging. setup.py is designed to be more flexible to enable a wider variety of user environments, but our CI has to be reproducible so that we can clearly pinpoint any issues in our build history.
body: Thanks for your input, however we will favor reproducibility in our CI to help us with debugging. `setup.py` is designed to be more flexible to enable a wider variety of user environments, but our CI has to be reproducible so that we can clearly pinpoint any issues in our build history.
